Articles.Content:
Hello there!

I am asking the community once more if they could create a emblem for one of my missions.

The mission uses this craft:

The crew are Mersy Raydon and Guston

I have sent one to the previous maker of my last emblem for the station that its visiting

But he hasn't responded

MUST ALSO INCLUDE "SESEOR" somewhere

I'm relying on you community lurkers!

Thanks in advance
Whats the mission? Im a bit confused...?
Looks cool but how are you going to use the Emblem?

The mission is to go to a space station in a high orbit above the mun

Malfunction, It goes on my mission report

That looks more like a rocket than a space station. It even has parachutes on it for return purposes!

That, on the other hand, looks a lot like a space station.

That looks more like a rocket than a space station. It even has parachutes on it for return purposes!

That, on the other hand, looks a lot like a space station.

That is because it is (facepalm)

"The mission is to go to a space station in a high orbit above the mun"
Anyone? Come on guys, important stuff here

Can't help emblem wise but one question.

No RCS?

I personally am no good with drawing, but two quick questions:

1) That ship is awfully tiny for a Mun orbit/rendezvous.

2) Concurrent with above: You'll need RCS If you want to dock. Also, landing legs and/or parachutes might be in order in case of the need for an emergency landing.

I personally am no good with drawing, but two quick questions:

1) That ship is awfully tiny for a Mun orbit/rendezvous.

2) Concurrent with above: You'll need RCS If you want to dock. Also, landing legs and/or parachutes might be in order in case of the need for an emergency landing.

Ah, come on...

On a side note, I don't think that a lower case nickname is suited for a forum!

Edited December 12, 2013 by Gnipu
you can dock without RCS, it just takes skill

I actually have docked the ship without RCS as art of my Mission (see signature) I just need a emblem! Its just that part of the rocket that is actually going to the Mun, of course its going to be on a rocket.
Come on guys! I'd do it myself but everyone else here seems far more capable of doing fancy emblems- if this doesn't make progress, I'll request one from the guy in fan works

Come on guys! I'd do it myself but everyone else here seems far more capable of doing fancy emblems- if this doesn't make progress, I'll request one from the guy in fan works

You can take a look at some of the stuff I've done Here. Pm me.
